#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
using namespace std;

int find_base(string n)
{
    if (n.size() == 1)
        return n[0]-47;
    int mx = n[0] > n[1] ? n[0] : n[1];
    for (int i = 2; i < n.size(); i++)
        mx = n[i] > mx ? n[i] : mx;
    return mx-47;
}

int base_10(string n1)
{
    int i, j, k = 0, l;
    j = find_base(n1);
    //ccout << j << endl;
    int n = atoi(n1.c_str());
    for(i = 0; n != 0; i++) {
        l = n % 10;
        k = k + (l * pow(j, i));
        n = n / 10;
    }
    //cout << k << endl;
    return k;
}
int main()
{
    int n, a, b, k;
    cin >> n;
    //scanf("%d", &n);
    string i, j;
    while(n--) {
        cin >> i >> j;
      //  cout << i << " " << j << endl;
        //scanf("%d %d", &i, &j);
        k = base_10(i) + base_10(j);
        cout << k << endl;
       // printf("%d\n", k);
    }

    return 0;
}
